verses.name: Ezekiel 20:1
verses.text: And it came to pass in the seventh year, in the fifth month, the tenth day of the month, that certain of the elders of Israel came to enquire of the Lord, and sat before me.

verses.name: Ezekiel 20:2
verses.text: Then came the word of the Lord unto me, saying,

verses.name: Ezekiel 20:3
verses.text: Son of man, speak unto the elders of Israel, and say unto them, Thus saith the Lord God; Are ye come to enquire of me? As I live, saith the Lord God, I will not be enquired of by you.
